name: @xonovex/ts-config-cli
description: TypeScript configuration for CLI tools and scripts
author: Xonovex

scripts.lint: echo 'No linting needed for JSON-only config package'
scripts.lint:fix: echo 'No linting needed for JSON-only config package'
scripts.typecheck: echo 'No typechecking needed for JSON-only config package'
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && echo "No build needed for config package" > dist/.gitkeep
